Project.name: Astronomy and Astrophysics Books of the 20th Century
Project.shortdesc: The AAB20 project contains the software used to produce and maintain the AAB20 RDF database.
Project.description: The AAB20 Software project contains the software used to produce and maintain the AAB20 RDF database. This database provides linked open data about astronomy and astrophysics books published in the 20th Century. The software was primarily written in Python 3.x under the Ubuntu operating system.
